id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-community-responding to community emergency with supported capability
title: Responding to community emergency with supported capability
description: Responding to community emergency with supported capability
content:
Scenario: Responding to community emergency with supported capability
    Given there's a community crisis (natural disaster, emergency)
    And everyone is mobilizing to help
    When Jordan wants to contribute to emergency response
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan identify safe ways to help
    And Jordan contributes at their capability (preparing supplies, making calls)
    And Jordan's crisis contribution is recognized and valued
    And the community includes Jordan in collective response
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for emergency care work
    And Jordan experiences being part of community resilience
    And Jordan's citizenship includes both receiving and providing care
